name: 2024 The 10th International Conference on Signal Processing
content: Publication: 1\. Conference Proceeding Submitted papers will go through a rigorous peer review process, and finally accepted papers after registration and presentation will be published in the conference proceedings which will be indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus, etc. 2\. Journal \*Journal of Communications (JCM) ISSN: 1796-2021 (Online); 2374-4367 (Print) | DOI: 10.12720/jcm Abstracting/Indexing: Scopus, DBLP, CrossRef, EBSCO, Google Scholar, CNKI, etc. \*Journal of Image and Graphics (JOIG) ISSN: 2301-3699 (Print); 2972-3973 (Online) | DOI: 10.18178/joig Abstracting/Indexing: Scopus (Since 2021), CNKI, Ulrich's Periodicals Directory, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc. \*International Journal of Signal Processing Systems (IJSPS) ISSN: 2315-4535 (Print) | DOI: 10.18178/ijsps Abstracting/Indexing: Ulrich's Periodicals Directory, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc.
